Your mission as a (Senior) Business Development Representative - LatAm
Appinio is looking for a rockstar (Senior) Business Development Representative - LatAm (m/f/d) to build a strong foundation for Appinio in this new market. You will play a pivotal role in building strategic relationships, identifying market opportunities, and laying the groundwork for our expansion into the LatAm region. This is a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of Appinio's entry into the LatAm market and to be a key contributor to the company's global success. The position offers a high degree of autonomy and the opportunity to shape the market strategy of a leading technology company.
What youâ€™ll be doing

Develop and execute a comprehensive market entry strategy for LatAm
Identify and build relationships with key stakeholders and potential clients in the region
Close meetings for the Sales Representatives
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop targeted campaigns for the LatAm market
Establish operational processes and ensure compliance with local needs

You will thrive in this role if

You have sales strategy development and execution skills
You have an understanding of the LatAm market, vertical distribution and business acumen
You are proficient in CRM and sales management tools
You have excellent communication and presentation skills
You have adaptability and cultural sensitivity
You have strategic thinking and problem-solving skills
You are results-oriented and self-motivated
You are based in LatAm

Whatâ€™s in it for you?

Flexibility Policy - meaning there is no hard cap on the number of vacation days
Udemy L&D Platform - full access to 22,000+ courses and certifications to deepen your knowledge as your career progresses
All the hardware you need and your own MacBook





This post not only outlines our ideal candidate but also serves as an inspiration for what this role can evolve into. Even if you consider yourself an 80% fit but have a genuine passion for this position, we encourage you to apply. We're eager to hear from individuals who share our enthusiasm.
Appinio is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.
